title: 148863273.karmic Democratism
excerpt: What kind of world do you want to live in?

children.text: What kind of world do you want to live in?
Do you want to live in a society where people are treated fairly?
One where you’re given the benefit of the doubt (without hesitation), or where people acknowledge your good intentions (without suspect)?
A world where people see you, respect you, listen in, return your calls, open doors, and acknowledge you exist?
A world where people lead with integrity (as opposed to managing with authority)—treating you like the intelligent, capable, reliable person you are?
Everyday, each of us gets to decide what kind of world we live in.
To emulate what we want to see in the world, to pay it forward, and to cast our vote in the epic cosmic-ballot of our times.
